steps.name: Navigate to url:
BASE - Typing textbox by setValue function with value "******" and needClickOption is "true"
BASE - Typing textbox by setValue function with value "******" and needClickOption is "true"
BASE - Click general element
When I navigate to menu "Database" with submenu "Database Editor"
Then I should see Database screen display
When I add new table with Name "jitapi007e" and Comment "Testing"
Then I should see the table with Name "jitapi007e" display
When I add new column with Name "jitapicol007e" Type "string" for Table name "jitapi007e"
When I navigate to menu "API" with submenu "API endpoints"
Then I should see API screen display
When I create new group API with name "groupapi007e"
Then I should see group api "groupapi007e" displayed in api list
When I select api name "groupapi007e" from list
When I add new API endpoint
When I set dropdown label "Method Type" in modal popup to value "PUT"
When I set textbox label "URL" in modal popup to value "/v1/jitera/put/:id"
When I set textbox label "Name" in modal popup to value "jitera put"
When I set dropdown label "Action" in modal popup to value "Update"
When I set dropdown label "Model" in modal popup to value "jitapi007es"
When I press general button "Create" in modal popup
Then I should see method "PUT" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/put/:id" displayed
When I edit API method "PUT" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/put/:id"
When I click tab "SQL Query" in floating panel
When I add row Definition-Value with static value Table "2" - row "1" - value "jitapi007es.jitapicol007e","static value","jitera put"
Then I should see floating panel has Model - DefinitionValue Table - row "1" - value "","request.id"
When I click tab "Request params" in floating panel
Then I should see floating panel has Params - row "1" - value "id","String".
When I add row Params index "2" - value "jitapicol007e","String".
When I click tab "Response params" in floating panel
When I expand the row name "jitapi007e"
When I add row Params index "5" - value "jitapicol007e","Column Definition","jitapicol007e"
When I close the floating panel
Then I should see method "PUT" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/put/:id" displayed
When I navigate to menu "Database" with submenu "Database Editor"
Then I should see Database screen display
When I navigate to menu "API" with submenu "API endpoints"
Then I should see API screen display
When I select api name "groupapi007e" from list
When I wait value-definition data API "jitapi007es.jitapicol007e" table "2" is fetched completely
When I wait response params data API "jitapicol007e" with parent "jitapi007e" - row "5" is fetched completely
When I edit API method "PUT" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/put/:id"
When I click tab "SQL Query" in floating panel
Then I should see floating panel has Model with static value - DefinitionValue Table "2" - row "1" - value "jitapi007es.jitapicol007e","static value","jitera put"
When I click tab "Request params" in floating panel
Then I should see floating panel has Params - row "1" - value "jitapicol007e","String".
Then I should see floating panel has Params - row "2" - value "id","String".
When I click tab "Response params" in floating panel
When I expand the row name "jitapi007e"
Then I should see floating panel has Params - row "5" - value "jitapicol007e","Column Definition","jitapicol007e"
When I close the floating panel
When I delete API method "PUT" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/put/:id"
Then I should NOT see method "PUT" with endpoint "/v1/jitera/put/:id" displayed
